title: Fairy
description:
A magical humanoid creature found in myths and fantasy stories. Generally depicted as having insect-inspired wings, it can also be assumed to be quite diminutive in size.

This emoji supports skin tones, and variations that are female or male.
apple_vendor_description: The fairy emoji on Apple devices is a whimsical and enchanting figure, often depicted with iridescent wings that shimmer with soft gradients.  Rendered with Apple's signature smooth curves and delicate details, she appears to float with a gentle glow, thanks to realistic lighting.  This magical emoji embodies fantasy, wonder, and good fortune, often used to add a touch of enchantment or to express a wish.
